articles.title: Letter of Thanks to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon
articles.content:
Letter of Thanks to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a letter of thanks from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on March 25.
					 The letter said:
					
					You, considerate of the huge damage Koreans in Japan suffered from the killer earthquake and ensuing tsunami, sent relief fund of 500,000 U.S. dollars to disaster-stricken compatriots.
					
					 The Chongryon Central Standing Committee, reflecting the profound reverence and loyalty of all the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan for you, extends the most heart-felt thanks to you for relieving compatriots of their quake damage and imbuing them with courage and strength of rebirth.
					
					 Moved to tears by the boundless solicitude you have shown by sending the fabulous amount of relief fund to Chongryon organizations and compatriots in the afflicted areas, all the Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan re-hardened their will to remain loyal to you to the last. 
					
					 The Chongryon Central Standing Committee will bear deep in mind your noble intention and more dynamically conduct the all-Korean activities of aiding the afflicted compatriots in an organizational way and thus demonstrate the might of Chongryon, an overseas organization of the DPRK, and achieve the unity of the compatriots community.
					
					 You are the sun of mankind and symbol of the victory of a thriving socialist nation and the benevolent father of Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan. The Committee wholeheartedly wishes you good health, reflecting the intense loyalty of Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Il from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Il from Mexican Party Leader
						
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee for the Workers' Party of Mexico, presented a letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il on March 19 on behalf of the participants in the 15th seminar of world political parties on building a new society.
					 The letter said:
					
					 You put Kim Il Sung's nation on the position of a political and ideological power, a military power that has access to a nuclear deterrent and a scientific and technological power. The credit for this goes to his Songun politics, a great political mode in the era of independence and an ever-victorious banner of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 You frustrated the strong-arm actions and arbitraries of the imperialists and the offensive to stifle the DPRK on the part of the U.S. imperialists and their satellite forces by dint of Songun and firmly protected Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses. This instilled the confidence in victory and courage into the world progressive political parties and people struggling for a new society. 
					
					 All the participants are unanimous in extending the warmest congratulations and the best wishes to you who are rendering the undying services for the accomplishment of the cause of global independence and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The letter stressed that the participants are convinced that the coming decades in the 21st century will shine as those of great victory of the experienced and seasoned politics of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Lao PM on Friendship with DPRK
articles.content:
Lao PM on Friendship with DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The traditional friendly relations between Laos and the DPRK provided by Kaysone Phomvihane and President Kim Il Sung have developed day by day under the deep care of the leaders of the two countries.
					 Lao Prime Minister Thongsing Thammavong who is a member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, said this on March 25 when he met and had a talk with a delegation of the DPRK Information Committee headed by Vice-Chairman Jong Yong Chol.
					
					He extended sincere congratulations to General Secretary Kim Jong Il upon his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea at the Conference of the WPK last year.
					
					 The Lao party and government positively support the Songun politics and the reunification cause of the DPRK and are convinced that the friendly relations between the two countries would further develop, he noted.
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater success in their drive to increase the defense capacity of the country, defend the gains of the revolution and build a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Meeting of Workers in Coal Industry Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Workers in Coal Industry Held
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The meeting of workers in the coal industry took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday.
					Present at the meeting were senior party, army and state officials, vice-premiers, chief secretaries of provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea, leading officials of the party, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials in the field of the coal industry, heroes, persons who were honored to be received by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and labor innovators.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, its participants heard the recorded speech "On Pushing Ahead with the Technical Revolution in the Coal Industry" made by Kim Il Sung at an enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK on December 1, Juche 69 (1980).
					
					 Vice-Premier Ro Tu Chol in a report referred to the immortal exploits performed by the peerlessly great men who defined the coal industry as a key industry dynamically promoting the development of the self-supporting national economy and led it wisely.
					
					 Kim Il Sung provided continuous field guidance to far and rugged coalfields all his life since he helped the coal industry take its first step right after the liberation of the country. He made sure that the national meeting of the officials in the field of the coal industry was held in the last year of his life and had a photo session with its participants.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il has put forward the coal industry as a pilot sector of the national economy and wisely led it to make an epochal turn in coal production.
					
					 Coal mines were actively put on a modern and scientific basis under the energetic leadership and deep care of Kim Jong Il and this helped lay more solid material and technical foundations for coal production and brought about a turn in the work style and attitude and ideological and mental traits of the officials and workers in the field of coal industry, the reporter said.
					
					 He called on all the officials and workers to attain without fail the goal of coal production set forth by the Party by displaying the indomitable mental power, upholding the slogan "Korea does what it is determined to do!" and thus make a positive contribution to bringing earlier building a thriving nation.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting said that they would consolidate the successes already gained at their units and conduct dynamic drive to modernize coal mines and expand the production capacity and thus make new miracles and innovations in coal production.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms US Harasser of Global Peace and Stability
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms US Harasser of Global Peace and Stability
						
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Stockholm International Peace Research Institute of Sweden recently issued an annual report on the worldwide arms export. 
					 According to it, the volume of sales of conventional weapons worldwide has increased 24 percent for the recent five years and the U.S. topped the list of the worldwide arms sellers.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Sunday says that number and facts fully revealed the U.S. true colors as the world's biggest arms trader.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 After the end of the Cold War the U.S. has massively increased the military expenditure and spurred the development and production of modern arms and equipment, prompted by its ambition for world supremacy. It has massively exported ammunitions to other countries as well.
					
					 The U.S. also tops the world list of arms provider to dispute and armed conflict-torn areas in the world. 
					
					 The U.S. is using arms export as leverage for domination and intervention in the internal affairs of other countries in a bid to secure an international environment for realizing its external policy for aggression.
					
					 It set those countries to which it will export its weapons in all regions and then sell weapons to them, fostering and escalating military confrontation among countries.
					
					 The U.S. is becoming all the more zealous in selling weapons to south Korea than other countries.
					
					 It is due to the U.S. arms sale that south Korea is turning into the hotbed of a dangerous nuclear war.
					
					 With nothing can the U.S. evade the blame as the arch criminal who is gravely threatening and harassing peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world and sparking off the worldwide arms race.

articles.title: Halt to S. Korean Authorities' Repressive Actions Demanded
articles.content:
Halt to S. Korean Authorities' Repressive Actions Demanded
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea demanded the authorities immediately stop their reckless repressive actions violating the academic freedom. It made this in an article posted on its Internet website on March 23.
					 The police is suppressing the research activities of members of the students' economic and academic organization as "enemy-benefiting" ones, the article said. This is a serious threat to the academic freedom.
					
					 Querying how the academic activities can become ones "benefiting the enemy," it accused the present "government" of intensifying the repression by invoking the "National Security Law" since its appearance.
					
					 The UN once recommended that the NSL should be abolished, it noted.
					
					 If the authorities block the students' research activities by invoking the evil law in the old era, they will be censured by broad circles, it said, demanding the release of all the arrested members.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about "Cheonan" Case and Realization of Peace Called for
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about "Cheonan" Case and Realization of Peace Called for
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Joint Action for Probing the Truth about "Cheonan" Warship Case and Realizing Peace on Korean Peninsula in south Korea at a press conference on March 24 called for probing the truth about the case and realizing peace on the peninsula.
					 A press release was read out at the conference. It said that the truth about the case has not yet been probed one year since the case occurred.
					
					 In this period the media, civic and public organizations, experts, lawmakers and others have analyzed the "government's" results of the investigation into the case time and again and raised many doubts about the place and time of sinking, torpedo design, adsorbent, etc., it noted.
					
					 It accused the authorities of threatening and mocking at those who made objected to their assertion and suppressing them by mobilizing the police and judicial mechanism.
					
					 Over the past one year the "government" and the military authorities have intensified the anti-DPRK confrontation moves such as the total suspension of the south-north dialogue, block of NGOs' exchange and large-scale joint war maneuvers against the DPRK based on the results of the investigation full of doubts and lies, it noted.
					
					 The U.S. is building the tripartite military alliance with Japan and south Korea with the case as a momentum and holding unchallenged military supremacy in Northeast Asia, it said.
					
					 It demanded the authorities clarify the truth about the case though belatedly.
					
					 On the same day Kyunghyang Daily News carried an article saying that the far-fetched assertion of the authorities on the case is triggering controversy.

articles.title: S. Korean Police's Moves to Stamp Out Democratization Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Police's Moves to Stamp Out Democratization Censured
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification in a statement on March 23 denounced the police authorities for their conspiratorial suppression to remain in power.
					 The statement recalled that the police on March 21 kicked up the large repressive racket against the students' economic and academic organization in Seoul, Kyonggi Province, Taegu, Pusan and all other areas in south Korea.
					
					 It condemned the security authorities for blocking the economic and academic researches of the students while terming them "enemy-benefiting".
					
					 It accused the Lee Myung Bak regime of having worked hard to stamp out democratization while drastically increasing the budget for the security organs for three years since it took office.
					
					 The recent suppression under the pretence of security was prompted by the scheme to calm down the people from all walks of life angered by the repressive rule of the present regime against democracy, people's livelihood and reunification, it noted.
					
					 The authorities should stop at once the repressive racket and no longer try to remain in power at the sacrifice of the people, it warned.

articles.title: DPRK's Just Cause Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Just Cause Supported
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The 15th seminar of world political parties on building a new society was held in Mexico from Mar. 17 to 19. It extended support to the DPRK's just cause. 
					 A joint statement was adopted at the seminar. It expressed the belief that all the Korean people in the north and the south and abroad would hold fast to the north-south joint declaration, banner of independent reunification and milestone of national prosperity, and the idea of "By our nation itself", its basic spirit. It also expressed the conviction that the Koreans would regard them as a lifeline of the movement for the country's reunification and thoroughly apply them to reality and thus brilliantly mark 2011 as a significant year in bringing about a new turn for independent reunification. 
					
					 The statement hoped that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people would conduct dynamic all-out offensive and make a breakthrough to realizing President Kim Il Sung's desire for building a prosperous and powerful country and commemorate the centenary of birth of the President as the greatest holiday of Kim Il Sung's nation and a great auspicious event in human history.
					
					 It expressed the belief that the WPK and the Korean people would surely win a victory in their general offensive for this year under the experienced and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Attending the seminar were delegations and delegates of more than 100 ruling and progressive political parties and organizations of at least 40 countries including the DPRK, China and Cuba and members of the leadership of the Workers' Party of Mexico.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised
						
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The world public is speaking highly of the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung who founded the great Songun idea and laid a solid foundation for the prosperity of the DPRK. 
					 Arpan, a newspaper of Nepal, said that the President, based on a bitter lesson drawn from the anti-Japanese national liberation movement, founded the Songun idea, keenly realizing that it would be possible to liberate Korea and advance the revolution only through the armed struggle.
					
					 Baluchistan Times, a newspaper of Pakistan, said that the army was founded in the DPRK ahead of the party and the state by the President's idea of attaching importance to the military affairs, the Songun idea. He is not only the founder of the Songun idea but the prominent leader who emerged ever-victorious through his Songun leadership in the whole period of his revolutionary activities, the paper added.
					
					 The chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain said with appreciation that the President turned the DPRK into a socialist power--independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Daily Monitor, an Ethiopian newspaper, noted that the DPRK has displayed its might as a power strong in politics and ideology and in military technique thanks to leader Kim Jong Il who developed in depth the Songun idea founded by the President and formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism.

articles.title: Ensuring Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for
articles.content:
Ensuring Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The secretary for International Relations of the Communist Party of the People of Spain, issued a statement on Mar. 15 as regards the recent situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The statement accused the United States of illegally occupying south Korea in 1945 prompted by its strategic interests, thus dividing the peninsula.
					
					 Its fuss about the "threat from the north" is aimed to justify its occupation of south Korea and convert the Korean Peninsula into a stronghold of strategic importance in invading Northeast Asia, the statement said.
					
					 It denounced the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises aimed at invading the DPRK and called for ensuring peace on the peninsula.
					
					 It expressed full solidarity with the Korean people's just struggle against the joint military exercises.

articles.title: Committee for Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Formed in Italy
articles.content:
Committee for Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Formed in Italy
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Italian preparatory committee for commemorating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed on Mar. 21.
					 At an inaugural ceremony Roberto Gabriele, general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, and Miriam Pelegrini Feri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely organize diverse events to praise the President and leader Kim Jong Il for their undying feats and conduct broad activities to give wide publicity to them on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: US Blocks Import from Japan's Radiation Zone
articles.content:
US Blocks Import from Japan's Radiation Zone
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The United States recently decided to halt the import of foodstuff from Japan. 
					 The U.S. Food and Drug Administration clarified its decision to stop import of foodstuff produced in four prefectures in Japan including Fukushima following the contamination of some foodstuff by radioactive materials.

articles.title: 73 Dead in Myanmar Earthquake
articles.content:
73 Dead in Myanmar Earthquake 
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 7 on the Richter scale jolted the eastern area of Myanmar on March 24.
					 It left 73 dead and at least 110 wounded and more than 300 buildings destroyed as of March 25.
					
					 Emergency rescue steps are being taken on the spot.

articles.title: Russian PM on Development of National Defence Industrial Complex
articles.content:
Russian PM on Development of National Defence Industrial Complex
 Moscow, March 25 (KCNA) -- Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin at a meeting on Mar. 21 referred to the development of the national defence industrial complex.
					He said that decisions on use of force are being adopted too easily when handling the international issues. Russia would purchase the samples of a total of 1,300 kinds of weapons and military technical equipment according to the national arms and equipment plan for 2020, he said, adding that the army will by then hold 70 percent of the ultra modern military hardware.
					
					 He emphasized that Russia will modernize all the fields of the national defence industrial complex producing missiles, airplanes, command and reconnaissance means, warships and munitions.

articles.title: Russian Strategic Bombers Make Patrol Flight in Sky above Pacific
articles.content:
Russian Strategic Bombers Make Patrol Flight in Sky above Pacific
 Moscow, March 25 (KCNA) -- Strategic bombers of the Russian air force made a patrol flight in the sky above the neutral waters of the Pacific.
					 Two Tu-95MCs that took off from the Ukrainka air force base made about 30-hour flight in line with international law.
					
					 A spokesman for the Russian air force clarified this on March 23.

articles.title: Iranian Air Force Warns Enemies against Military Actions
articles.content:
Iranian Air Force Warns Enemies against Military Actions
 Tehran, March 25 (KCNA) -- Iranian Air Force Lieutenant Commander Brigadier General Hossein Chitforoush on Monday warned the enemies against their anti-Iran military actions.
					 The Iran Air Force is totally capable to counter enemies and avert the threats, he said. Iran has succeeded in gaining the technical know-how for producing stealth aircraft and drones.
					
					 He reiterated the country's Air Force's capability to repel enemy threats, adding that the force is closely monitoring even the minor military moves made by the enemies in the region.

articles.title: Iran Condemns Insult to Holy Quran in US
articles.content:
Iran Condemns Insult to Holy Quran in US
 Tehran, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Iranian Foreign Ministry in a statement on Thursday strongly condemned the recent insult to the Muslims' holy book in the U.S. state of Florida, and warned that the U.S. attempts to spread Islamophobia in the world.
					 Iranian Foreign Ministry Spokesman Ramin Mehman-Parast condemned the "abhorrent" act of burning Quran, the Muslim Holy book, in Florida.
					
					 He expressed concern over the desecration of the holy Quran in the U.S. and described the move as "blasphemous and repugnant".
					
					 Such radical acts are the result of Islamophobic moves in the U.S. and those who have committed such crimes are contributing to U.S. hegemonic plots, which seek to create a rift between divine religions," Mehman-Parast said Thursday.

articles.title: Bolivia Censures US Conspiratorial Maneuverings
articles.content:
Bolivia Censures US Conspiratorial Maneuverings
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Bolivian President Evo Morales censured the U.S. scheme against his country on March 21.
					 The USAID has constantly hatched plots against Bolivia, he said, adding that his government will no longer tolerate it.
					
					 He warned that Bolivia would expel the members of the USAID from the country.

articles.title: Belarus Accuses West of Slapping Sanctions against It
articles.content:
Belarus Accuses West of Slapping Sanctions against It
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The information director of the Belorussian Foreign Ministry accused the West of extending sanctions on his country.
					 He branded the recent EU resolution on slapping heavier sanctions against Belarus as an undisguised act to put pressure on a sovereign state.
					
					 The EU runs roughshod over the regulations and principles of international law, he said. It has already been proved on many occasions that the sanctions policy has no prospect.

articles.title: France Fines US Company
articles.content:
France Fines US Company
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- France imposed 100,000 euro fine on the U.S. Goggle Company.
					 This was reportedly taken following the company's unwarranted collection of data about an individual person from wireless regional communications network defying the demand of France.
